summary: In the year 2045, a L.A.P.D. detective and his new Android partner enter the Zone, which is a forbidden section of the city plagued with an unknown disease. Together, they discover the reason everyone is sick, and try to stop the illness.
cast: Michael Jai White|Kadeem Hardison|Randy Wayne|Charles S. Dutton|Larissa Vereza|Gerald Webb|Duane Avery|Morgan Benoit|Deena Trudy|Jay Brothers|Kay D'Arcy|Jay Gillespie|William Guirola|George Kokkoris|Danny Ledsinger|Greyson Lewis|Kaiwi Lyman|Mahmoud Osman|Ian Roberts|Marcus Shirock|Theresa June-Tao|Steve Tom|Pernille Trojgaard|Delpaneaux Wills|Ryan Mckenney|Madison Boyd|Kelly Gremli|Adrienne McQueen|Matthew Moran|Ian Roberts|Carl Soto|Bryan Stamp
title: Android Cop
